pr_title: Store last checkbox status in preferences

timeline.message: Store last checkbox status in preferences

timeline.bodyText: I don't know enough about this code to know whether it's a problem, but this uses setChangeMade(false) here and resetChangeMade(); - should those be consistent?
timeline.author: bobjacobsen

replies.bodyText:
setChangeMade() sets the dirty flag. resetChangeMade() clears the dirty flag. The argument false to setChangeMade() only tells to not fire an update.
I have copied the code for ComboBox so they uses the same principle.
replies.author: danielb987
